1. Il doit communiquer les informations: 1. He must communicate the following information
1. S’il ne l’a pas déjà fait, il doit cr: 1. If he has not already done so, he must create his account on the Saber platform.
2. Il enregistre ensuite les produits qu: 2. He then registers the products he wishes to import. For this, he must provide the following information for each product
2. Si le type d’approbation doit répondr: 2. If the type of approval must meet the 1a scheme, only a documentary check is necessary. If the type of approval must meet schemes 3 or 5, a half-day audit must be carried out by the certification body in one of the manufacturing plants (the audit is similar to the ISO 9001 check, but less intrusive).
3. Il doit choisir un organisme certific: 3. He must choose a mandated certification body from the available list (the region of the certification body must correspond to that of the exporter. For example, if the exporter is in France, he can choose QIMA Europe).
3. Une fois que toutes les étapes ont ét: 3. Once all the steps have been validated by the certification body, a product certificate and a shipping certificate will be issued. The shipment can only be made after receipt of these two certificates
4. Par la suite, il recevra l’ID Saber R: 4. Subsequently, he will receive the Saber Request ID, which he must communicate to the exporter.
: plateforme développée par le gouvernem: : platform developed by the Saudi government to simplify the registration of requests and the obtaining of product certificates and shipping certificates.
: programme de vérification de conformit: : conformity verification program for products intended to be imported into Saudi Arabia. This program covers all types of products, with the exception of food, chemicals, cosmetics, medical equipment and pharmaceutical products which fall under the SFDA program.
Ce programme d’évaluation de la conformi: This product conformity assessment program concerns both importers (buyers) and exporters (sellers), each of whom has a role to play in obtaining the necessary certificates.
Il est important de noter que l’évaluati: It is important to note that conformity assessment may also involve laboratory testing, quality inspections and other measures to ensure the safety and compliance of imported products in Saudi Arabia. These procedures ensure fair international trade and protect the interests of Saudi consumers.
L’importateur est responsable de la prem: The importer is responsible for the first step. He must register his order on the Saber platform.
Pour cela, plusieurs dispositifs ont été: For this, several devices have been put in place, such as the SABER or SFDA platform, which allow to validate this step according to the typology of imported products. The SABER platform offers a transparent and simplified process for the registration and certification of products for the SALEEM program, while the SFDA focuses specifically on products: food, chemicals, cosmetics, medical equipment and pharmaceutical products.
Quel est votre type d'approbation: 1a, 3: What is your type of approval: 1a, 3 or 5?
Rapports de tests (de préférence issus d: Test reports (preferably from an ISO 17025 accredited laboratory).
Toutes les exportations à destination de: All exports to Saudi Arabia require a product conformity assessment, in accordance with the regulations in force.
Une fois l’ID Saber Request obtenu, l’ex: Once the Saber Request ID has been obtained, the exporter must contact the chosen certification body.
